chunk:
Birch Babe Organic Rejuvinating Face Cream

Brand: Birch Babe

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Castor Flakes Vegetable Wax, *Rosa Canina Fruit (Rosehip) Oil, *Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter) Fruit, *Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, *Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, *Glycerin, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, *Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Tocopherol (Vitamin E) Oil, Botanical Rosehip

*Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, *Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, *Glycerin, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, *Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Tocopherol (Vitamin E) Oil, Botanical Rosehip Extract, Glycerin & Water & Sodium Levulinate & Sodium Anisate, *Lavandula Hybrida (Lavender) Oil, *Olibanum (Frankincense) Oil, *Pelargonium

Seed Oil, Tocopherol (Vitamin E) Oil, Botanical Rosehip Extract, Glycerin & Water & Sodium Levulinate & Sodium Anisate, *Lavandula Hybrida (Lavender) Oil, *Olibanum (Frankincense) Oil, *Pelargonium Graveolens (Geramium) Oil.

Directions: For a rich and deep hydration, massage a small amount of Rejuvenating Face cream into your face and neck using upward and outward strokes. Repeat morning and night or as needed for some extra TLC.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer
